description: Krishak Bakri Palan Yojna in Himachal Pradesh provides financial assistance to farmers for goat rearing to enhance rural livelihoods.
key_features: Support for fodder and veterinary care

benefits.financial_support: Subsidies for goat purchase and management

criteria: Farmers and rural households in Himachal Pradesh
Preference for small and marginal farmers

steps: Apply through local animal husbandry department
